mapper.select: SELECT ck.fOptimizeGroupName AS "groupName", ck.fType AS "type", ck.fTerminalType AS "terminalType", tu.fLoginName as "userName", tc.fContactPerson as "customerName", COUNT(1) AS "totalKeywordCount", SUM(IF(ck.fOptimizeRemainingCount > 0, 1, 0)) AS "needOptimizeKeywordCount", SUM(IF(ck.fFailedCause > '', 1, 0)) AS "failedKeywordCount", SUM(IF(ck.fOptimizedCount = 0, 1, 0)) AS "zeroOptimizedCount", SUM(IF(ck.fLastReachStandardDate = CURRENT_DATE(), 1, 0)) AS "reachStandardKeywordCount", SUM(IF(ck.fLastReachStandardDate = CURRENT_DATE(),ck.fTodayFee, 0)) as "todaySubTotal", SUM(ck.fOptimizePlanCount) AS "totalOptimizeCount", SUM(ck.fOptimizedCount) AS "totalOptimizedCount", SUM(ck.fOptimizeRemainingCount) AS "needOptimizeCount", SUM(ck.fQueryCount) AS "queryCount" FROM t_customer_keyword ck,t_customer tc ,t_userinfo tu WHERE ck.fStatus = 1 and tc.fUserID=tu.fLoginName and ck.fCustomerUuid=tc.fUuid and tu.fLoginName = #{criteria.userName} and ck.fOptimizeGroupName = #{criteria.groupName} AND ck.fType = #{criteria.entryType} AND ck.fTerminalType = #{criteria.terminalType} AND tc.fContactPerson like concat('%', #{criteria.customerName}, "%") GROUP BY tu.fLoginName, ck.fType, ck.fTerminalType ORDER BY tu.fLoginName;

SELECT ursi.fUserName AS 'userName', ursi.fTotalKeywordCount AS 'totalKeywordCount', ursi.fNeedOptimizeKeywordCount AS 'needOptimizeKeywordCount', ursi.fZeroOptimizedCount AS 'zeroOptimizedCount', ursi.fReachStandardKeywordCount AS 'reachStandardKeywordCount', ursi.fTodaySubTotal AS 'todaySubTotal', ursi.fTotalOptimizeCount AS 'totalOptimizeCount', ursi.fTotalOptimizedCount AS 'totalOptimizedCount', ursi.fNeedOptimizeCount AS 'needOptimizeCount', ursi.fQueryCount AS 'queryCount', ursi.fTotalMachineCount AS 'totalMachineCount', ursi.fUnworkMachineCount AS 'unworkMachineCount', ursi.fMaxInvalidCount AS 'maxInvalidCount', ursi.fIdleTotalMinutes AS 'idleTotalMinutes' FROM t_user_refresh_statistic_info ursi WHERE date_format(#{criteria.historyDate},'%Y-%m-%d') = ursi.fCreateDate AND ursi.fType = #{criteria.entryType} AND ursi.fTerminalType = #{criteria.terminalType} and fGroupName =#{criteria.groupName} and fUserName =#{criteria.userName} and fCustomerName =#{criteria.customerName} GROUP BY ursi.fUuid ORDER BY ursi.fUserName
